name: Stick-Man 2d Skate Boarding
description:
STICKMAN SKATING! skateboarding games rock.
Extreme Stickman game in a cool city skate game town. Use your stick skater boy skills as you jump and trick your way past hard obstacles and rails in your stickman skate battle for survival. If you enjoy stickman sports games like stickman golf and stickman base jumping were sure you will love this one. Finger tap skating has never been so cool. Kick flip away!
